Title: Relates to prohibiting certain discriminatory peremptory challenges to prospective jurors
Summary: Prohibits peremptory challenges of prospective jurors based on race, color, national origin, ancestry, gender, gender identity or expression, religion, religious practice, age, disability, or sexual orientation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to prohibiting peremptory challenges of prospective jurors based on race, color, national origin, ancestry, gender, gender identity or expression, religion, religious practice, age, disability, or sexual orientation
